long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The RenovationsPlus Plugin is an add-on that will let you access information on all services given by Renovations Plus using just a couple of clicks.

Renovations Plus of Naples
11983 Tamiami Trail N Suite #110 
Naples
FL 34110

Renovations Plus is an expert general contractor and a full-service remodeling company in Naples, Florida with over 18 years of experience in the field. 
The objective of this plugin is to enable our customers and potential customers the ease of finding out about services and accessing information about them. In it we have added links to all of our services and when clicked they will open up a new tab and the specific service page will be displayed to be viewed & understood easily.

RenovationsPlus Plugin Installation process

You can easily install our Toolkit, using the following steps:

1) Click the “Add to Chrome” button
2) You will be directed to the next screen, where you can click the “Add Extension” button
3) A message will pop up with the text “The RenovationsPlus Plugin has successfully been added to Chrome”
4) Now you can go ahead and use the Toolkit!

We have divided the plugin tool into 2 main services sections, namely Residential Services and Commercial Services. You can find below the complete set of service information links that this plugin offers:

Residential Services

1.	Kitchen Remodeling

Whether it’s new cabinets, upgraded appliances or countertop, built-ins, or even an island that you require, Renovations Plus will help you to bring it to life.

2.	Bathroom Remodeling

We will work to maximize the available space to beautify and enhance the efficiency of your current bathroom.

3.	Painting & Dry Walling

The expert painting and drywalling technicians at Renovations Plus use only the best quality drywall with the most up-to-date techniques and tools to make each application a fantastic one.

4.	Trim Carpentry & Cabinet Installation

Trim carpentry and cabinet installation can add the finishing touches to your home that highlight the difference between custom and routine construction and installation.

5.	Professional Flooring & Installation

The experts at Renovations Plus are here to ensure that your flooring is installed with precision and expertise that serves your specific functional needs.

6.	Home Repairs

Quality home repairs can enhance both the beauty and value of your property, and bring the fresh look you’ve been wanting!

7.	House Additions

Our home addition craftsmen will not only enhance the beauty of your home but a quality-built addition will also add value to your home.

8.	Home Elevators
Renovations Plus offers a separate division of carpenters and a complete staff of in-house craftsmen, which allows us to be responsive to unique needs such as home elevators.

9.	Roofing Services and Repairs

The Renovations Plus roofing crew is a clear choice for a first-class roof in the Naples, Florida region.

10.	Siding Services

Our siding products & services we use will not only withstand the weather, but provide safe, attractive, and energy-efficient coverage that will keep your property free from damage and decay.

11.	Hurricane & Storm Repairs

Over 18 years of experience in the Naples, Florida area has given the Renovations Plus hurricane damage repair technicians the knowledge and experience to help our customers put their property back into shape so it can shine like new again.

Commercial Services

1.	Commercial Build-outs & Renovations

Commercial build-out construction is a common business need for small, medium, and large enterprises. Our build-out specialists are trained to re-define any existing small or large working area (such as a warehouse) into more of a multi-functional office space building.

2.	Commercial Building Renovations Remodeling

The Renovations Plus commercial building remodeling and renovations team are always ready to work with you and discover opportunities to optimize your renovation so it will hold up both today and in the future.

Below you can find some good reasons as to why you should use the RenovationsPlus Plugin:

•	Ease of use – Get access to all of Renovation Plus Service information in one browser extension.
•	It is Free – The use of the Plugin is completely free of charge
•	Fast Installation – It’s very easy to install. A few clicks you are ready to go
•	No Need for Bookmarks – Our plugin helps you find the information about our services in just one click
•	Easy Removal – If you want to discontinue using the toolkit, you can uninstall it easily.

FAQs on our Plugin:

What are the browsers I can use this on?
Currently, we only provide this plugin for Google Chrome but we have plans to provide it for other browsers as well. Watch this space or our website for more information.

Why is the RenovationsPlus Plugin available for free?
At Renovations Plus we want to make our customers’ lives as easy as possible. By making this plugin and giving it out for free we expect nothing less.

Is there any place I can offer feedback/suggestions about the Plugin?
We will always cherish any feedback that you can provide. Please feel free to drop us an email with your suggestions/opinions at info@renovations-plus.com
